data.name: SelectSpfRecordsToSchedule
data.value: SELECT id FROM spf_scheduled_records WHERE UTC_TIMESTAMP() > DATE_ADD(last_checked, INTERVAL @refreshIntervalSeconds SECOND) ORDER BY id, last_checked LIMIT @limit;

data.name: UpdateSpfRecordsLastChecked
data.value: UPDATE spf_scheduled_records SET last_checked = UTC_TIMESTAMP() WHERE LOWER(id) IN ({0});
